metadata.name: Exports Registry Key To a File
metadata.comment: Detects the export of the target Registry key to a file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regedit.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regedit.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―e '))) AND NOT ((contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hklm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkey_local_machine'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\system')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\sam')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\security')))))

output.summary: Detects the export of the target Registry key to a file.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.parent_process.name, process.cmd_line False positive: Legitimate export of keys References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Regedit/, https://gist.github.com/api0cradle/cdd2d0d0ec9abb686f0e89306e277b8f
